metadata.description: The Fabulous Furry Freak Brothers are a trio of underground comix characters created by the legendary Gilbert Shelton. First appearing in 1968, the brothers appeared in many underground papers and comics before being published as a series of comic books. Their lives revolving around the procurement and enjoyment of recreational drugs, the stories often satirize establishment and right-wing politics, and are highly topical with respect to the counterculture era of the 60s and 70s. And Fat Freddy's Cat really doesn't like cockroaches.
metadata.name: The Freak Brothers and Fat Freddy's Cat
